desc: The best damn cider around. The Cambridge Cider Company make hand crafted Cider and Perries from locally sourced, hand picked fruit. We believe in letting our exceptional Cambridgeshire (and some neighbouring counties) apples speak for themselves.

layout.text: WELCOME TO THE CAMBRIDGE CIDER COMPANY
WE MAKE HAND CRAFTED CIDERS AND PERRIES FROM LOCALLY SOURCED, HAND PICKED FRUIT.
